member.name: T:VideoWall.Common.Helpers.PreOrPostCondition
member.summary: Contains PreOrPostCondition check features, which allows to throw exceptions or work with assertions.
member.remarks: Contains parts from ScrumTable (HSR, 2010) Reviewed by Lukas Elmer, 05.06.2012

member.name: M:VideoWall.Common.Helpers.PreOrPostCondition.AssertInRange``1(``0,``0,``0,System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that the given value is in the specified range. Otherwise an exception (or assertion) will be thrown.
member.param: Specifies the name of the argument to check.
Specifies the lower bound (a valid value).
Specifies the upper bound (a valid value).

member.name: M:VideoWall.Common.Helpers.PreOrPostCondition.AssertNotNull(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that the given object is not null. Otherwise an exception will be thrown.
member.param: Specifies the name of the argument to check.

member.name: M:VideoWall.Common.Helpers.PreOrPostCondition.AssertNotNullOrEmpty(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that the given object is not null or empty. Otherwise an exception will be thrown.

Specifies the argument exception message to throw.
